Package net.lightstone.model

Class Summary
Chunk Represents a chunk of the map.
Chunk.Key A chunk key represents the X and Z coordinates of a chunk and implements the Chunk.Key.hashCode() and Chunk.Key.equals(Object) methods making it suitable for use as a key in a hash table or set.
ChunkManager A class which manages the Chunks currently loaded in memory.
Entity Represents some entity in the world such as an item on the floor or a player.
EntityManager A class which manages all of the entities within a world.
Item An immutable class which represents an in-game item (this also includes blocks which are dropped on the floor or placed in the player's inventory).
ItemEntity Represents an item that is also an Entity within the world.
Mob A Mob is a Player or Monster.
Monster Represents a monster such as a creeper.
Player Represents an in-game player.
Position An immutable class which represents a position within the in-game world.
Rotation An immutable class which represents a rotation in the in-game world.
SlottedItem A class which represents an Item and its associated slot in an inventory.
